title: Contaminated India-made spray linked to deadly outbreak in U.S.

title: Amit Shah in J&K for first visit since abrogation of Article 370, goes to meet slain cop's family

title: SC notice to Centre on bail plea of ex-Jharkhand minister Anosh Ekka
description: A Ranchi court had sentenced the former Jharkhand minister to seven-year imprisonment and had slapped him with a fine of ₹2 crore in connection with a money laundering case.

title: Life expectancy in India dropped by two years due to COVID-19: study
description: "The life expectancy at birth in 2019 was 69.5 years for men and 72 years for women, which came down to 67.5 years and 69.8 years, respectively, in 2020," the report said

title: PM Modi to meet seven Indian COVID-19 vaccine manufacturers on October 23
description: Representatives from seven vaccine makers – Serum Institute of India, Bharat Biotech, Dr Reddy’s Laboratories, Zydus Cadila, Biological E, Gennova Biopharma and Panacea Biotech – will be participating in the meeting.

title: Coronavirus updates | COVID-19 cases on the rise in China as Beijing, several provinces continue to report spike
description: Kid-size doses of Pfizer’s COVID-19 vaccine appear safe and nearly 91% effective at preventing symptomatic infections in 5- to 11-year-olds, according to study details released Friday as the U.S. considers opening vaccinations to that age group

title: Rahul meets Gujarat Cong. leaders
description: Organisation revamp, Assembly polls discussed

description: Telecom regulator says it will not shy away from taking action in the “larger interest” of consumers

description: They are operatives of various proscribed organisations

description: He was speaking at event to mark 50 years of victory in India-Pakistan War

description: Top U.S. officials from the FBI and the Department of Justice have held a meeting with their counterparts from the CBI to further strengthen the law

description: These give Army the ability to hit targets deep inside China in case of any misadventure

description: Hindutva is neither Left nor Right, says RSS general secretary at book discussion

description: British Foreign Secretary on India trip

description: The Bharatiya Mazdoor Sangh (BMS) on Friday announced that it would hold nationwide protests on October 28 seeking a stop to the government’s

title: Air bubbles to continue for some time
description: Frequency can be increased on routes that see demand, says Civil Aviation Minister.

title: CPI(M) meeting to take stand on Congress
description: Party General Secretary Sitaram Yechury argues that the threat from BJP after 2019 victory has only increased

title: Bhima Koregaon Commission summons Param Bir Singh and Rashmi Shukla
description: They are directed to respond by November 8

title: India, U.K. have agreed to strengthen climate initiatives, says Union Minister Bhupender Yadav
description: The U.K. will host the 26th Conference of Parties (COP26) to the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change from October 31 to November 12

title: 79 cases booked under unlawful conversion law in U.P
description: Charge sheets have been filed in 50 cases, while final report has been filed in seven cases.

description: U.K. Cheif of the Defence Staff (CDS) Nicholar Carter is on an visit to India.

title: OTT platforms to participate in IFFI
description: Festival to be held between November 20 and 28; Martin Scorsese and Istvan Szabo to be conferred lifetime achievement awards.

title: India remains steadfast partner in global efforts to combat Covid: PM Modi
description: Wishes continued to pour in for India from various heads of state and government a day after the cumulative COVID-19 vaccine doses administered in the country surpassed the 100-crore milestone.

title: Abolish Consumer Protection Act if you don’t want tribunals, SC tells Centre
description: “If the government does not want the tribunals then abolish the act”

title: Delhi riots: Court warns police commissioner of action for non-submission of report
description: The Court also cautioned the police commissioner and DCP (North East) that it will hold them personally responsible for the imposition of cost in case the investigating officers seek an adjournment for compliance with the orders in a riots case.

title: PM misleading people on COVID-19 vaccines: Congress
description: Opposition asks for white paper on meeting year-end jab-for-all deadline

title: Winter session of Parliament likely from November-end
description: The session, likely to have around 20 sittings, will conclude ahead of Christmas.

title: U.K. Navy Chief arrives in India on three-day visit
description: Admiral Radakin met Indian Navy Chief Admiral Karambir Singh.

title: Supreme Court agrees to hear plea seeking setting up of community kitchens in India
description: A Bench comprising Chief Justice N. V. Ramana and Justices Surya Kant and Hima Kohli was urged by lawyer Ashima Mandla that the issue becomes more important in view of COVID-19.

title: Haj 2022 registration to open in November
description: Pilgrims will be selected on basis of full vaccination compliance, Govt. guidelines

title: Chhattisgarh: 26 ITBP jawans fall ill after consuming food at camp in Rajnandgaon
description: “All of them belong to the ITBP’s 40th battalion and were stationed in Malaida camp of the security forces located in a Naxal-hit area along the Chhattisgarh-Madhya Pradesh border, around 150 kms away from capital Raipur,” a police official said.

title: Bengal can’t bar CBI, Centre tells Supreme Court
description: The power to withhold consent to the agency is not absolute, the Union Government says in its affidavit.

title: Celebrate festivals with precaution, says PM Modi in address to nation
description: He lauds people over milestone of 100 crore vaccinations

title: Congress facing bad days due to non-fulfilment of promises: Mayawati
description: The BJP, she said, is also poised to face the same fate as that of the Congress due to its alleged failure to fulfil promises made to the people

title: PM Modi congratulates Indians on reaching vaccine milestone
description: India reached the 100-crore vaccination milestone just about nine months since starting vaccination

title: Prime Minister Narendra Modi to address the nation at 10 a.m.
description: His address comes a day after the cumulative COVID-19 vaccine doses crossed the landmark figure of 100 crores in India
